name: CUBELAND
description:
A city builder. No cube was harmed during the development of this game. The game saves automatically.

Screenshots are saved in c:\users\*username*\appdata\local\cubeland\Screens\

WARNING: the game is stable but still on a beta version. If you notice some bug/glitch please notice.

Official FB page: https://www.facebook.com/pg/mtfujis

YT channel:https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2xDDg3xNJOpjqJB8ec_E7Q
